                        <h2>Professional Tax Preparation Services</h2>
                        <p>Tax preparation is complex, time-consuming, and costly if done incorrectly. Whether you're a business owner, freelancer, or high-net-worth individual, Phenom provides expert tax preparation services that ensure accuracy, maximize deductions, and keep you compliant with all tax authorities.</p>
                        
                        <p>Our CPAs and tax professionals have extensive experience with US IRS, UK HMRC, Canada CRA, and other tax authorities worldwide.</p>

                        <h3 id="corporate"> Corporate Tax Returns</h3>
                        
                        <h4> US Corporate Tax (Form 1120)</h4>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-building"></i>
                                <h4>C-Corporation Returns</h4>

                            </div>

                            </div>

                            <div class="feature-item">

                                <p>Quarterly estimated tax calculations (Form 1120-W)</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h4>What's Included:</h4>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Income statement reconciliation</li>
                            <li>Book-to-tax adjustments (M-1, M-3)</li>
                            <li>Depreciation schedules (Form 4562)</li>
                            <li>State corporate tax returns (all 50 states)</li>
                            <li>Multi-state apportionment</li>
                            <li>Tax provision calculations (ASC 740)</li>
                            <li>E-filing with IRS and state agencies</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h4> UK Corporation Tax (CT600)</h4>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Corporation Tax computation</li>

                            <li>Capital allowances optimization</li>
                            <li>R&D tax credit claims</li>
                            <li>Group relief and consortium relief</li>

                        </ul>

                            <li>SR&ED (Scientific Research) credits</li>

                        </ul>

                            <li><strong>Itemized Deductions:</strong> Schedule A optimization</li>
                            <li><strong>State Returns:</strong> All state income tax filings</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Professional Payroll Services</h2>
                        <p>Payroll is one of the most critical yet time-consuming tasks for any business. Errors can lead to unhappy employees, tax penalties, and compliance issues. At Phenom Outsourcing, we take the burden of payroll off your shoulders with our comprehensive payroll processing services.</p>
                        
                        <p>Our experienced payroll specialists handle everything from calculating wages and deductions to filing tax forms and generating reports, ensuring your employees are paid accurately and on time, every time.</p>

                        <h3 id="processing"> Complete Payroll Processing</h3>

                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="compliance"> Multi-Country Payroll Compliance</h3>
                        
                        <h4> US Payroll</h4>

                    <article>
                        <h2>Expert Accounting for Irish Businesses</h2>
                        <p>Running a business in Ireland requires compliance with Revenue Commissioners' regulations, understanding FRS 102, and managing various reporting obligations. Phenom Outsourcing provides specialized accounting services for Irish businesses, combining local expertise with global efficiency.</p>
                        
                        <p>Our team understands Irish GAAP, FRS 102, Revenue requirements, and Companies Registration Office (CRO) obligations, helping you stay compliant while saving up to 50% on accounting costs.</p>

                        <h3 id="vat"> VAT Returns & Compliance</h3>
                        <p>Expert Irish VAT management:</p>
                        
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-file-invoice"></i>
                                <h4>VAT3 Returns</h4>
                                <p>Bi-monthly VAT returns filed via ROS (Revenue Online Service)</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-percentage"></i>
                                <h4>VIES & Intrastat</h4>
                                <p>EU sales lists and Intrastat reporting</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-globe"></i>
                                <h4>VAT on E-Services (VOES)</h4>
                                <p>VAT MOSS for digital services</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-building"></i>
                                <h4>VAT Registration</h4>
                                <p>Help with VAT registration and tax number application</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3>Irish VAT Rates</h3>
                        <p>We handle all Irish VAT rate calculations:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>23% Standard Rate:</strong> Most goods and services</li>
                            <li><strong>13.5% Reduced Rate:</strong> Fuel, electricity, construction</li>
                            <li><strong>9% Second Reduced Rate:</strong> Tourism, newspapers, e-books</li>
                            <li><strong>4.8% Livestock Rate:</strong> Agricultural products</li>
                            <li><strong>0% Zero Rate:</strong> Exports, certain food items</li>
                            <li><strong>Exempt:</strong> Financial services, medical services</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="bookkeeping"> Irish Bookkeeping Services</h3>
                        <p>Daily bookkeeping following Irish standards:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Bank Reconciliation:</strong> Irish bank accounts (AIB, BOI, Ulster Bank, etc.)</li>
                            <li><strong>Sales & Purchase Ledgers:</strong> Complete transaction recording</li>
                            <li><strong>VAT Tracking:</strong> Proper VAT categorization for all transactions</li>
                            <li><strong>Fixed Assets:</strong> Fixed asset register and depreciation</li>
                            <li><strong>Accruals & Prepayments:</strong> Period-end adjustments</li>
                            <li><strong>Management Accounts:</strong> Monthly P&L and Balance Sheet</li>
                            <li><strong>FRS 102 Compliance:</strong> Financial Reporting Standard adherence</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="payroll"> Irish Payroll Services (PAYE)</h3>
                        <p>Full Irish payroll management:</p>
                        
                        <h4>PAYE Modernisation</h4>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Real-time PAYE reporting to Revenue</li>
                            <li>Payroll submission on or before pay date</li>
                            <li>Employee pay and file (EPF)</li>
                            <li>RPNs (Revenue Payroll Notifications) processing</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h4>Payroll Calculations</h4>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>PAYE:</strong> Pay As You Earn income tax</li>
                            <li><strong>PRSI:</strong> Pay Related Social Insurance (Classes A, J, K, etc.)</li>
                            <li><strong>USC:</strong> Universal Social Charge</li>
                            <li><strong>LPT:</strong> Local Property Tax deductions</li>
                            <li><strong>Pension Contributions:</strong> PRSAs and occupational pensions</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h4>Payroll Reporting</h4>
                        <ul>
                            <li>P30 monthly return (now via PAYE Modernisation)</li>
                            <li>P35 year-end return</li>
                            <li>P45 for leaving employees</li>
                            <li>P60 end of year certificates</li>
                            <li>PRSI contribution statements</li>
                        </ul>

                        <div class="feature-grid">

                            </div>

                        <h3>Irish Tax Rates</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>12.5%:</strong> Trading income (Ireland's competitive rate)</li>
                            <li><strong>25%:</strong> Non-trading income (rental, investment)</li>
                            <li><strong>33%:</strong> Capital gains (with reliefs available)</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="cro"> Companies Registration Office (CRO) Filing</h3>
                        <p>Complete CRO compliance services:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Annual Return (B1):</strong> Annual return within 28 days of ARD</li>
                            <li><strong>Financial Statements:</strong> Abridged or full accounts filing</li>
                            <li><strong>Director Changes:</strong> B10 forms for director appointments/resignations</li>
                            <li><strong>Share Allotments:</strong> B5 forms for new shares</li>
                            <li><strong>Company Changes:</strong> Address changes, secretary changes</li>
                            <li><strong>Auditor Appointment:</strong> B67 notice of auditor</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Audit Support & Preparation</h2>

                        <h2>Expert Accounting for Canadian Businesses</h2>
                        <p>Running a business in Canada comes with unique accounting challengesfrom navigating GST/HST regulations to complying with CRA requirements across different provinces. At Phenom Outsourcing, we provide comprehensive accounting services tailored specifically for Canadian businesses.</p>
                        
                        <p>Our team of experienced accountants understands Canadian tax laws, ASPE/IFRS standards, and provincial requirements, ensuring your business stays compliant while you save up to 50% on accounting costs.</p>

                        <h3 id="gst"> GST/HST Filing & Compliance</h3>

                <main class="main-content">
                    <article>
                        <h2>Expert Bookkeeping Services</h2>
                        <p>Bookkeeping is the foundation of good financial management. Without accurate books, you can't make informed business decisions, file taxes correctly, or secure financing. Yet for most business owners, bookkeeping is time-consuming, tedious, and takes time away from growing the business.</p>
                        
                        <p>Phenom provides professional bookkeeping services that keep your financial records accurate, organized, and up-to-dateso you can focus on what you do best.</p>

                        <h3 id="daily"> Daily Bookkeeping Services</h3>
                        <p>Complete transaction recording and categorization:</p>
                        
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-receipt"></i>
                                <h4>Transaction Recording</h4>
                                <p>Every income and expense properly categorized</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-file-invoice-dollar"></i>
                                <h4>Invoice Entry</h4>
                                <p>Customer invoices and sales receipts</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-money-bill"></i>
                                <h4>Bill Entry</h4>
                                <p>Vendor bills and purchase orders</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-credit-card"></i>
                                <h4>Bank & Credit Card</h4>
                                <p>All bank and credit card transactions</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h4>What We Record:</h4>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Sales & Revenue:</strong> Customer payments, sales receipts, deposits</li>
                            <li><strong>Expenses:</strong> Vendor bills, credit card charges, cash expenses</li>
                            <li><strong>Payroll:</strong> Employee wages, taxes, benefits</li>
                            <li><strong>Bank Transactions:</strong> Transfers, fees, interest</li>
                            <li><strong>Petty Cash:</strong> Small cash expenses tracking</li>
                            <li><strong>Inventory:</strong> Purchases and cost of goods sold</li>
                            <li><strong>Fixed Assets:</strong> Equipment purchases and depreciation</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="reconciliation"> Bank & Credit Card Reconciliation</h3>
                        <p>Monthly reconciliation to ensure accuracy:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Bank Accounts:</strong> All checking and savings accounts</li>
                            <li><strong>Credit Cards:</strong> Business credit cards and lines of credit</li>
                            <li><strong>PayPal/Stripe:</strong> Online payment processors</li>
                            <li><strong>Loan Accounts:</strong> Loan principal and interest tracking</li>
                            <li><strong>Merchant Accounts:</strong> Square, Shopify, Amazon, etc.</li>
                            <li><strong>Investment Accounts:</strong> Brokerage and investment tracking</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h4>Reconciliation Process:</h4>
                        <ol style="line-height: 2;">
                            <li>Download bank statements and transaction data</li>
                            <li>Match each transaction to bookkeeping entries</li>
                            <li>Identify and resolve discrepancies</li>
                            <li>Mark reconciliation complete with opening/closing balances</li>
                            <li>Provide reconciliation report to client</li>
                        </ol>

                        <h3 id="ap-ar"> Accounts Payable & Receivable</h3>
                        
                        <h4>Accounts Payable Management:</h4>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-file-invoice"></i>
                                <h4>Bill Entry</h4>
                                <p>Vendor invoices entered and coded</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-calendar-check"></i>
                                <h4>Payment Scheduling</h4>
                                <p>Track due dates and plan payments</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-money-check-alt"></i>
                                <h4>Payment Processing</h4>
                                <p>Record checks, ACH, wire transfers</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-bar"></i>
                                <h4>Vendor Reports</h4>
                                <p>Aging reports and payment history</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h4>Accounts Receivable Management:</h4>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-file-invoice-dollar"></i>
                                <h4>Invoice Generation</h4>
                                <p>Professional invoices created and sent</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-hand-holding-usd"></i>
                                <h4>Payment Recording</h4>
                                <p>Customer payments applied correctly</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-clock"></i>
                                <h4>Aging Tracking</h4>
                                <p>Monitor overdue accounts</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-envelope"></i>
                                <h4>Follow-Up</h4>
                                <p>Payment reminder support</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3 id="reporting"> Financial Reporting</h3>
                        <p>Monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements:</p>
                        
                        <h4>Standard Reports Provided:</h4>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Profit & Loss Statement:</strong> Income and expenses by category</li>
                            <li><strong>Balance Sheet:</strong> Assets, liabilities, and equity</li>
                            <li><strong>Cash Flow Statement:</strong> Operating, investing, financing activities</li>
                            <li><strong>General Ledger:</strong> Complete transaction detail</li>
                            <li><strong>Trial Balance:</strong> Account balances verification</li>
                            <li><strong>Budget vs. Actual:</strong> Performance against budget</li>
                            <li><strong>Accounts Aging:</strong> AR and AP aging summaries</li>
                            <li><strong>Sales Reports:</strong> By customer, product, location</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h4>Custom Reports Available:</h4>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Department or location-specific P&L</li>
                            <li>Job costing and profitability</li>
                            <li>Inventory valuation and turnover</li>
                            <li>Key performance indicators (KPIs)</li>
                            <li>Break-even analysis</li>
                            <li>Cash flow projections</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="cleanup"> Catch-Up & Cleanup Services</h3>
                        <p>Behind on bookkeeping? We'll get you current:</p>
                        
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-calendar-alt"></i>

                                <p>Months or years of missing transactions</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-broom"></i>
                                <h4>Books Cleanup</h4>
                                <p>Fix errors, duplicates, miscategorizations</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-sync-alt"></i>
                                <h4>File Conversion</h4>
                                <p>Migrate from spreadsheets to accounting software</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-check-double"></i>
                                <h4>Reconciliation Backlog</h4>
                                <p>Reconcile all unreconciled months</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h4>Our Cleanup Process:</h4>
                        <ol style="line-height: 2;">
                            <li><strong>Assessment:</strong> Review current state and identify issues</li>
                            <li><strong>Document Collection:</strong> Gather all bank statements and records</li>
                            <li><strong>Data Entry:</strong> Enter all missing transactions</li>
                            <li><strong>Reconciliation:</strong> Reconcile all accounts for all periods</li>
                            <li><strong>Error Correction:</strong> Fix miscodings and duplicates</li>
                            <li><strong>Financial Statements:</strong> Generate clean financials</li>
                            <li><strong>Handoff:</strong> Train you on ongoing maintenance</li>
                        </ol>

        // Load Header
        fetch('../../includes/header.html')
            .then(response => response.text())
            .then(data => {
                document.getElementById('header-placeholder').innerHTML = data;
                
                // Initialize after header loads
                setTimeout(() => {
                    if (typeof initMobileMenu === 'function') initMobileMenu();
                    if (typeof initStickyHeader === 'function') initStickyHeader();

     <!-- FavIcon  -->

            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            gap: 1rem;
            margin: 2rem 0 3rem;
        }
        
        .category-btn {
            padding: 1rem;
            background: var(--white);
            border: 2px solid var(--border-color);
            border-radius: 0.5rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all var(--transition-normal);
            text-align: center;
            font-weight: 600;
        }
        
        .category-btn:hover,
        .category-btn.active {
            background: #4a90e2;
            color: white;
            border-color: #4a90e2;
        }

            margin-bottom: 3rem;
        }

            color: #4a90e2;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;

        }

            .faq-categories {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }
        }
    </style>

            <p class="lead">Find answers to common questions about our services</p>

    <section class="page-content">
        <div class="container">
            <div style="max-width: 900px; margin: 0 auto;">
                
                <!-- Search Bar -->
                <div class="faq-search">
                    <i class="fa-solid fa-search"></i>

                        <i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i><br>All Questions

                <!-- Getting Started FAQs -->
                <div class="faq-section" data-category="getting-started">
                    <h2><i class="fa-solid fa-rocket"></i> Getting Started</h2>
                    
                    <div class="faq-accordion">
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> How do I get started with Phenom?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>Getting started is simple! Contact us through our website, email, or phone. We'll schedule a free consultation to understand your needs, provide a customized quote, and if you're happy, we can onboard you within 48-72 hours. The process involves signing an engagement letter, providing access to your accounting software, and introducing you to your dedicated team.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> How long does the onboarding process take?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>Typically 2-5 business days. This includes: initial consultation (Day 1), agreement signing and access setup (Day 2-3), team training and historical data review (Day 3-4), and first deliverable (Day 5). For urgent needs, we can expedite this to 24-48 hours.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> What information do you need from me?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>We'll need: access to your accounting software (QuickBooks, Xero, etc.), bank account logins (view-only) or statements, credit card statements, prior year financial statements, tax returns, vendor and customer lists, and any specific reporting requirements. We provide a detailed checklist during onboarding.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> Do I need to have accounting software already?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>No, we can help you choose and set up the right software for your business. We'll recommend the best platform based on your industry, size, and needs. If you're currently using spreadsheets, we can migrate your data to a professional accounting system.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Pricing FAQs -->
                <div class="faq-section" data-category="pricing">
                    <h2><i class="fa-solid fa-dollar-sign"></i> Pricing & Billing</h2>
                    
                    <div class="faq-accordion">
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> How much does your service cost?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>Pricing depends on your specific needs, transaction volume, and service level. Basic bookkeeping starts at $299/month, while comprehensive accounting packages range from $599-$1999/month. Most clients save 40-60% compared to hiring in-house or using local firms. Contact us for a customized quote.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> Are there any setup fees or hidden costs?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>No hidden fees! We charge a one-time setup fee ($199-$499) for initial cleanup and setup, which is clearly stated upfront. Monthly fees are transparent and fixed. If you need additional services beyond your package, we'll quote them separately before proceeding.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> What payment methods do you accept?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>We accept: credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex), ACH/bank transfer, wire transfer (international), and PayPal. Monthly subscriptions are typically charged automatically on the 1st of each month.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> Is there a long-term contract?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>No! We work on a month-to-month basis. You can cancel anytime with 30 days notice. We believe in earning your business every month through quality service, not locking you into contracts.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Security FAQs -->
                <div class="faq-section" data-category="security">
                    <h2><i class="fa-solid fa-shield-halved"></i> Security & Data Protection</h2>
                    
                    <div class="faq-accordion">
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> How do you ensure my data is secure?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>We employ multiple security layers: 256-bit SSL encryption, ISO 27001 certified data centers, secure VPN connections, two-factor authentication, regular security audits, and strict access controls. All staff sign NDAs and undergo background checks. Your data is encrypted both in transit and at rest.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> Who has access to my financial information?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>Only your dedicated team members have access, and it's limited to what they need for their specific role. We use role-based access control. Team members cannot download or export data without authorization. All access is logged and monitored.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> Are you GDPR compliant?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>Yes, we are fully GDPR compliant for our European clients. We have Data Processing Agreements (DPAs) in place, maintain detailed data processing records, and honor all data subject rights including the right to access, rectification, and erasure.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> What happens to my data if I leave?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>Your data is YOUR data. Upon termination, we'll provide all files, reports, and work product in your preferred format. We'll maintain access for 30 days for smooth transition, then securely delete all data from our systems as per our data retention policy.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Process FAQs -->
                <div class="faq-section" data-category="process">
                    <h2><i class="fa-solid fa-cogs"></i> Process & Workflow</h2>
                    
                    <div class="faq-accordion">
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> How does the monthly workflow work?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>Typical monthly cycle: You upload documents/provide access (1st-5th of month)  We process transactions and reconcile accounts (3rd-8th)  Quality review by senior accountant (8th-9th)  Draft financials sent to you (10th)  Review call if needed (10th-12th)  Final reports delivered (15th). Urgent items are handled immediately.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> How do I communicate with my team?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>Multiple channels: dedicated email (fastest for non-urgent), phone/video calls (scheduled or ad-hoc), WhatsApp (quick questions), project management tools (task tracking), and monthly review calls. Your account manager is your primary contact for everything.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> What if I need something urgently?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>We have an escalation process for urgent requests. Contact your account manager by phone or mark emails as "URGENT". We can typically turn around urgent requests within 4-24 hours depending on complexity. Critical items like payroll or tax filings are always prioritized.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Services FAQs -->
                <div class="faq-section" data-category="services">
                    <h2><i class="fa-solid fa-briefcase"></i> Services</h2>
                    
                    <div class="faq-accordion">
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> What services do you offer?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>We offer: daily bookkeeping, accounts payable/receivable, bank reconciliation, financial reporting, payroll processing, tax preparation (corporate and individual), VAT/GST returns, audit support, budgeting and forecasting, cash flow management, and CFO advisory services.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> Can you handle my industry-specific needs?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>Yes! We have specialists in: construction (job costing, WIP), e-commerce (multi-channel, inventory), healthcare (insurance billing), real estate (property-level accounting), hospitality, professional services, manufacturing, and more. We understand industry-specific regulations and reporting.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> Do you prepare tax returns?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>Yes, we prepare corporate tax returns (Form 1120, 1120S, 1065), individual returns (Form 1040), state returns, and international returns (UK, Canada, Australia). All returns are reviewed by CPAs. We also handle sales tax, payroll tax, and VAT/GST returns.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Software FAQs -->
                <div class="faq-section" data-category="software">
                    <h2><i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i> Software & Technology</h2>
                    
                    <div class="faq-accordion">
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> What accounting software do you support?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>We support 20+ platforms including QuickBooks (Online & Desktop), Xero, Sage (all versions), FreshBooks, Wave, MYOB, NetSuite, Zoho Books, and more. We're certified in QuickBooks and Xero. If you use something else, chances are we can work with it.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> Can you migrate me to a different software?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>Absolutely! We handle complete data migration from any platform to any other (or from spreadsheets to software). This includes: data extraction, mapping chart of accounts, importing historical data, reconciliation verification, and training. Typical migration takes 1-2 weeks.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> Do I need to buy accounting software?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>Software costs are separate from our service fees. QuickBooks Online ranges from $30-$200/month, Xero $13-$70/month. We can help you choose the right plan and sometimes get discounted rates through our partner programs. Some free options like Wave are also available.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Support FAQs -->
                <div class="faq-section" data-category="support">
                    <h2><i class="fa-solid fa-headset"></i> Support & Communication</h2>
                    
                    <div class="faq-accordion">
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> What are your support hours?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>Our teams work in shifts to provide near 24/5 coverage (Monday-Friday). US clients: 9 AM - 5 PM EST, UK clients: 9 AM - 5 PM GMT, Australia: 9 AM - 5 PM AEST. Email support is monitored 24/7 with responses within 4-24 hours. Emergency support is available for critical issues.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> Will I have a dedicated contact person?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>Yes! Every client gets a dedicated Account Manager who oversees your account, coordinates the team, and is your primary point of contact. Premium clients also get a dedicated bookkeeper assigned exclusively to their account.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <button class="faq-question">
                                <span><i class="fa-solid fa-circle-question"></i> What if I'm not satisfied with the service?</span>
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-down"></i>
                            </button>
                            <div class="faq-answer">
                                <p>We have a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy, tell us immediately and we'll make it rightwhether that's reassigning team members, adjusting processes, or providing a refund. We also conduct quarterly satisfaction surveys to proactively address any concerns.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Still Have Questions CTA -->
                <div style="background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a90e2, #357abd); padding: 3rem; border-radius: 1rem; margin: 4rem 0; text-align: center; color: white;">
                    <h2 style="color: white; margin-bottom: 1rem;">Still Have Questions?</h2>
                    <p style="font-size: 1.125rem; margin-bottom: 2rem; opacity: 0.9;">Our team is here to help you with any questions</p>
                    <div style="display: flex; gap: 1rem; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap;">
                        <a href="/pages/contact.html" style="padding: 1rem 2rem; background: white; color: #4a90e2; border-radius: 0.5rem; text-decoration: none; font-weight: 600;">
                            <i class="fa-solid fa-envelope"></i> Contact Us
                        </a>
                        <button onclick="openModal()" style="padding: 1rem 2rem; background: transparent; color: white; border: 2px solid white; border-radius: 0.5rem; font-weight: 600; cursor: pointer;">

                        </button>

            .then(response => response.text())
            .then(data => {
                document.getElementById('header-placeholder').innerHTML = data;

                    if (typeof initMobileMenu === 'function') initMobileMenu();
                    if (typeof initStickyHeader === 'function') initStickyHeader();

            })
            .catch(error => console.error('Header error:', error));

            .then(response => response.text())

            .catch(error => console.error('Footer error:', error));
    </script>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Scaffolding Accounting Services - Phenom</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Specialized accounting for scaffolding businesses. Job costing, equipment tracking, WIP schedules, CIS compliance.">
    
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/style.css">
     <!-- FavIcon  -->
    <link rel="icon" href="Logo1.jpeg" type="image/x-icon">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/assets/css/pages.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">

</head>
<body>

            </nav>
        </div>
    </section>

    <section class="page-hero">
        <div class="container">
            <h1> Scaffolding Business Accounting</h1>
            <p class="lead">Specialized accounting for scaffolding contractors and rental companies</p>
        </div>
    </section>

    <section class="page-content">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="content-layout">
                <aside class="sidebar">
                    <div class="sidebar-widget">
                        <h3>Scaffolding Services</h3>
                        <ul class="sidebar-menu">
                            <li><a href="#job-costing">Job Costing</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#equipment">Equipment Tracking</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#wip">WIP Schedules</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#cis">CIS Compliance (UK)</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#invoicing">Progress Invoicing</a></li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="sidebar-widget cta-widget">
                        <h3>Industry Expert</h3>
                        <p>Talk to our construction specialist</p>
                        <button class="btn-primary" onclick="openModal()">Get Started</button>
                    </div>
                </aside>

                <main class="main-content">
                    <article>
                        <h2>Accounting Built for Scaffolding Businesses</h2>
                        <p>Scaffolding businesses face unique accounting challenges: tracking equipment across multiple job sites, managing CIS deductions, calculating job profitability, and handling complex rental vs. contract revenue. Phenom provides specialized accounting that understands the scaffolding industry inside and out.</p>

                        <h3 id="job-costing"> Job Costing & Profitability</h3>
                        <p>Know exactly which jobs are profitable:</p>
                        
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-calculator"></i>
                                <h4>Project-Level Tracking</h4>
                                <p>Track costs and revenue by individual job or contract</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-line"></i>
                                <h4>Real-Time Profitability</h4>
                                <p>See job margins as work progresses</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i>
                                <h4>Labor Cost Tracking</h4>
                                <p>Track scaffolder hours and wages per job</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-truck"></i>
                                <h4>Material & Transport</h4>
                                <p>Track material costs and delivery expenses</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3>Cost Categories We Track</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Direct Labor:</strong> Scaffolder wages, supervision, overtime</li>
                            <li><strong>Equipment Costs:</strong> Scaffolding materials, tools, safety equipment</li>
                            <li><strong>Transport:</strong> Delivery and collection vehicle costs</li>
                            <li><strong>Subcontractors:</strong> Specialist subcontractor costs</li>
                            <li><strong>Site Costs:</strong> Permits, inspections, site-specific expenses</li>
                            <li><strong>Overhead Allocation:</strong> Proportional overhead applied to jobs</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="equipment"> Equipment & Asset Tracking</h3>
                        <p>Manage your scaffolding inventory efficiently:</p>

                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-boxes"></i>
                                <h4>Equipment Register</h4>
                                <p>Complete inventory of tubes, fittings, boards, towers</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-map-marker-alt"></i>
                                <h4>Location Tracking</h4>
                                <p>Know where equipment is deployed at all times</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-wrench"></i>
                                <h4>Maintenance Schedules</h4>
                                <p>Track inspections and maintenance history</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-bar"></i>
                                <h4>Utilization Rates</h4>
                                <p>Measure equipment usage and efficiency</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3>Asset Management Features</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Depreciation calculations (straight-line or reducing balance)</li>
                            <li>Equipment hire vs. purchase analysis</li>
                            <li>Replacement cost tracking</li>
                            <li>Equipment acquisition and disposal recording</li>
                            <li>Insurance valuation reports</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="wip"> Work in Progress (WIP) Management</h3>
                        <p>Accurate WIP reporting for construction contracts:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Contract Value:</strong> Total contract amount tracking</li>
                            <li><strong>Costs to Date:</strong> Actual costs incurred on project</li>
                            <li><strong>Estimated Costs to Complete:</strong> Projected remaining costs</li>
                            <li><strong>Percentage Complete:</strong> Progress measurement (costs or physical)</li>
                            <li><strong>Revenue Recognition:</strong> Percentage-of-completion method</li>
                            <li><strong>Overbilling/Underbilling:</strong> Contract asset/liability tracking</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="cis"> CIS Compliance (UK Scaffolding)</h3>
                        <p>Complete Construction Industry Scheme compliance:</p>
                        
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-file-contract"></i>
                                <h4>CIS Registration</h4>
                                <p>Help with CIS registration as contractor/subcontractor</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-percent"></i>
                                <h4>Deduction Tracking</h4>
                                <p>Track 20% or 30% CIS deductions correctly</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-file-invoice"></i>
                                <h4>Monthly Returns</h4>
                                <p>CIS300 monthly return preparation and filing</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-check-circle"></i>
                                <h4>Verification</h4>
                                <p>Subcontractor verification before payment</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3>CIS Services Include</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Subcontractor verification via HMRC</li>
                            <li>Gross payment status applications</li>
                            <li>CIS deduction calculations (materials vs. labor)</li>
                            <li>Payment and deduction statements</li>
                            <li>Annual CIS reconciliation</li>
                            <li>Reverse charge VAT for construction services</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="invoicing"> Progress Billing & Invoicing</h3>
                        <p>Professional invoicing for scaffolding contracts:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Application for Payment:</strong> Monthly payment applications</li>
                            <li><strong>Retention Management:</strong> Track retention held (typically 3-5%)</li>
                            <li><strong>Milestone Billing:</strong> Invoice based on completion stages</li>
                            <li><strong>Time & Materials:</strong> Daywork and material invoicing</li>
                            <li><strong>Rental Billing:</strong> Weekly/monthly scaffold hire charges</li>
                            <li><strong>Variation Orders:</strong> Track and bill contract changes</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Revenue Types We Handle</h2>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-file-contract"></i>
                                <h4>Contract Work</h4>
                                <p>Fixed-price scaffolding contracts</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-calendar"></i>
                                <h4>Hire/Rental</h4>
                                <p>Weekly or monthly equipment rental</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-clock"></i>
                                <h4>Labor Only</h4>
                                <p>Scaffolder day rates and hourly billing</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-handshake"></i>
                                <h4>Design & Consultancy</h4>
                                <p>Design services and site surveys</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h2>Reports for Scaffolding Businesses</h2>
                        <p>Essential reports to run your business:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Job Profitability Report:</strong> Profit/loss by project</li>
                            <li><strong>WIP Schedule:</strong> Work in progress summary</li>
                            <li><strong>Equipment Utilization:</strong> Usage rates by asset type</li>
                            <li><strong>Outstanding Invoices:</strong> Aged receivables by customer</li>
                            <li><strong>Retention Tracking:</strong> Amounts held and release dates</li>
                            <li><strong>Cash Flow Forecast:</strong> Project expected cash flows</li>
                            <li><strong>Labor Analysis:</strong> Productivity and labor cost per job</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Health & Safety Compliance</h2>
                        <p>While not strictly accounting, we help track:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Safety equipment purchases and maintenance</li>
                            <li>Training costs and certification tracking</li>
                            <li>Insurance costs (liability, employers', equipment)</li>
                            <li>LOLER inspection costs and scheduling</li>
                            <li>Incident costs and insurance claims</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Software Integration</h2>
                        <p>We integrate with scaffolding-specific software:</p>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                                <h4>Sage Construction</h4>
                                <p>Sage 100 Contractor, Sage 300 CRE</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                                <h4>QuickBooks</h4>
                                <p>QuickBooks with job costing add-ons</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                                <h4>Procore</h4>
                                <p>Construction management platform</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                                <h4>ScaffPlan/Avontus</h4>
                                <p>Scaffolding design and estimating software</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h2>Why Scaffolding Companies Choose Us</h2>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-hard-hat"></i>
                                <h4>Industry Knowledge</h4>
                                <p>We understand scaffolding business operations</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-line"></i>
                                <h4>Better Margins</h4>
                                <p>Identify unprofitable jobs and improve pricing</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-money-bill-wave"></i>
                                <h4>Cash Flow Management</h4>
                                <p>Manage retention, progress payments, and expenses</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-shield-alt"></i>
                                <h4>Compliance Ready</h4>
                                <p>CIS, VAT, tax compliance handled expertly</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h2>Get Started</h2>
                        <p>Ready to improve profitability and gain better control over your scaffolding business finances? Our construction accounting specialists are here to help.</p>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Salon & Beauty Accounting Services - Phenom</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Specialized accounting for salons, spas, and beauty businesses. Appointment-based revenue, commission tracking, inventory management.">

     <!-- FavIcon  -->

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/assets/css/pages.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">

</head>

    <div class="scroll-progress" id="scrollProgress"></div>

    <section class="page-hero">
        <div class="container">
            <h1> Salon & Beauty Business Accounting</h1>
            <p class="lead">Specialized accounting for salons, spas, barbershops, and beauty professionals</p>
        </div>
    </section>

    <section class="page-content">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="content-layout">
                <aside class="sidebar">
                    <div class="sidebar-widget">
                        <h3>Salon Services</h3>
                        <ul class="sidebar-menu">
                            <li><a href="#revenue">Revenue Tracking</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#commission">Commission Calculations</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#inventory">Product Inventory</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#tips">Tips & Gratuities</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#payroll">Stylist Payroll</a></li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="sidebar-widget cta-widget">
                        <h3>Beauty Expert</h3>
                        <p>Talk to our salon specialist</p>
                        <button class="btn-primary" onclick="openModal()">Get Started</button>
                    </div>
                </aside>

                <main class="main-content">
                    <article>
                        <h2>Accounting Built for Beauty Businesses</h2>
                        <p>Salon and beauty businesses have unique accounting needs: managing stylist commissions, tracking appointment-based revenue, handling cash and card tips, inventory management for retail products, and dealing with booth rentals. Phenom provides specialized accounting that understands the beauty industry.</p>

                        <h3 id="revenue"> Revenue Tracking & Recognition</h3>
                        <p>Track all revenue streams accurately:</p>
                        
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-cut"></i>
                                <h4>Service Revenue</h4>
                                <p>Hair, nails, skincare, spa treatments</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-shopping-bag"></i>
                                <h4>Product Sales</h4>
                                <p>Retail sales of haircare, cosmetics, tools</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-ticket"></i>
                                <h4>Gift Cards & Packages</h4>
                                <p>Deferred revenue tracking</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-handshake"></i>
                                <h4>Memberships</h4>
                                <p>Recurring membership revenue</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3>Revenue Categories</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Service Revenue by Type:</strong> Hair, color, treatments, nails, facials, massage</li>
                            <li><strong>Stylist/Technician:</strong> Revenue by individual service provider</li>
                            <li><strong>Product Sales:</strong> Professional vs. retail products</li>
                            <li><strong>Package Deals:</strong> Multi-service packages and memberships</li>
                            <li><strong>Gift Certificates:</strong> Sold vs. redeemed tracking</li>
                            <li><strong>Booth Rental Income:</strong> Independent stylist rental fees</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="commission"> Commission & Compensation</h3>
                        <p>Complex commission structures made simple:</p>

                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-percent"></i>
                                <h4>Tiered Commission</h4>
                                <p>40%, 50%, 60% based on performance</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-calculator"></i>
                                <h4>Gross vs. Net</h4>
                                <p>Commission on gross or after product costs</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-user-tie"></i>
                                <h4>Booth Renters</h4>
                                <p>Track rental payments vs. employees</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-line"></i>
                                <h4>Performance Bonuses</h4>
                                <p>Monthly/quarterly bonus calculations</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3>Commission Models We Handle</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Percentage of Service:</strong> 40-60% of service revenue</li>
                            <li><strong>Tiered Commission:</strong> Higher rates at revenue thresholds</li>
                            <li><strong>Hourly + Commission:</strong> Base wage plus percentage</li>
                            <li><strong>Booth Rental:</strong> Fixed weekly/monthly rent</li>
                            <li><strong>Hybrid Models:</strong> Different rates for services vs. products</li>
                            <li><strong>New Client Bonuses:</strong> Extra commission for new business</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="inventory"> Product & Inventory Management</h3>
                        <p>Track professional and retail products:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Professional Products:</strong> Color, chemicals, styling products used in services</li>
                            <li><strong>Retail Products:</strong> Products sold to customers</li>
                            <li><strong>Cost of Sales:</strong> Calculate true service costs including products used</li>
                            <li><strong>Reorder Points:</strong> Alerts when inventory runs low</li>
                            <li><strong>Vendor Management:</strong> Track suppliers and wholesale pricing</li>
                            <li><strong>Shrinkage:</strong> Monitor product loss and theft</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3>Inventory Tracking Features</h3>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-boxes"></i>
                                <h4>Stock Levels</h4>
                                <p>Real-time inventory quantities</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-dollar-sign"></i>
                                <h4>Product Costing</h4>
                                <p>Track cost per service using COGS</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-pie"></i>
                                <h4>Best Sellers</h4>
                                <p>Top-selling retail products analysis</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-tags"></i>
                                <h4>Pricing Analysis</h4>
                                <p>Retail markup and margin tracking</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3 id="tips"> Tips & Gratuity Management</h3>
                        <p>Accurate tip tracking and allocation:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Cash Tips:</strong> Daily cash tip collection and distribution</li>
                            <li><strong>Card Tips:</strong> Credit/debit card gratuities</li>
                            <li><strong>Tip Pooling:</strong> Shared tips among team members</li>
                            <li><strong>Tip Reporting:</strong> IRS Form 4070 compliance (US)</li>
                            <li><strong>Payroll Integration:</strong> Tips included in payroll for tax withholding</li>
                            <li><strong>Tip Distribution:</strong> Calculate fair split among staff</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="payroll"> Stylist & Staff Payroll</h3>
                        <p>Handle complex beauty industry payroll:</p>

                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i>
                                <h4>Multiple Classifications</h4>
                                <p>Employees vs. booth renters (1099)</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-hand-holding-usd"></i>
                                <h4>Commission Payroll</h4>
                                <p>Calculate commissions plus tips</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-clock"></i>
                                <h4>Variable Hours</h4>
                                <p>Track hourly vs. commission employees</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-file-contract"></i>
                                <h4>1099 Processing</h4>
                                <p>Year-end 1099s for independent stylists</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3>Payroll Challenges We Solve</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Minimum wage compliance when commission falls short</li>
                            <li>Overtime calculations for hourly+commission employees</li>
                            <li>Salon vs. booth renter classification (IRS/DOL compliance)</li>
                            <li>Tip credit calculations (where applicable)</li>
                            <li>PTO and sick leave tracking</li>
                            <li>Education/training time compensation</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Salon Business Models</h2>
                        <p>We understand all salon operating models:</p>

                        <h3> Commission Salon</h3>
                        <p>Traditional model where stylists are employees earning commission (40-60%) plus tips</p>

                        <h3> Booth Rental/Suite Salon</h3>
                        <p>Independent stylists rent space and keep 100% of revenue minus rent</p>

                        <h3> Hybrid Model</h3>
                        <p>Mix of commission employees and booth renters</p>

                        <h3> Salon Chain/Multi-Location</h3>
                        <p>Multiple locations requiring consolidated reporting</p>

                        <h2>Key Performance Metrics</h2>
                        <p>Reports to grow your salon business:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Revenue per Stylist:</strong> Individual performance tracking</li>
                            <li><strong>Service vs. Retail Mix:</strong> Balance of income sources</li>
                            <li><strong>Client Retention Rate:</strong> Repeat client percentage</li>
                            <li><strong>Average Ticket:</strong> Average spend per visit</li>
                            <li><strong>Utilization Rate:</strong> Booked hours vs. available hours</li>
                            <li><strong>Product Attach Rate:</strong> Retail sales per service</li>
                            <li><strong>Labor Cost %:</strong> Total labor as % of revenue (target: 45-55%)</li>
                            <li><strong>Profit Margin by Service:</strong> Which services are most profitable</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Software Integration</h2>
                        <p>We integrate with popular salon management systems:</p>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                                <h4>Vagaro</h4>
                                <p>Salon scheduling and POS integration</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                                <h4>Mindbody</h4>
                                <p>Spa and wellness business software</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                                <h4>Square</h4>
                                <p>Square for Salons POS system</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                                <h4>Booker</h4>
                                <p>Appointment booking and management</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h2>Tax Considerations</h2>
                        <p>Special tax issues for beauty businesses:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Sales Tax:</strong> Taxable services vary by state/country</li>
                            <li><strong>Tip Reporting:</strong> IRS tip income requirements</li>
                            <li><strong>1099 vs. W-2:</strong> Proper worker classification</li>
                            <li><strong>Deductible Expenses:</strong> Education, tools, products, licensing</li>
                            <li><strong>Inventory Deduction:</strong> COGS for retail products</li>
                            <li><strong>Home Office:</strong> For booth renters working from suites</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Why Salons Choose Phenom</h2>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-scissors"></i>
                                <h4>Industry Expertise</h4>
                                <p>We understand salon business operations</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-line"></i>
                                <h4>Better Profitability</h4>
                                <p>Identify opportunities to increase margins</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i>
                                <h4>Stylist Satisfaction</h4>
                                <p>Accurate, transparent commission payments</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-clock"></i>
                                <h4>Save Time</h4>
                                <p>Focus on clients, not bookkeeping</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h2>Get Started</h2>
                        <p>Ready to streamline your salon accounting? Our beauty industry specialists understand your unique challenges and can help you gain better control over your finances.</p>

                            <button class="btn-large" onclick="openModal()">Talk to a Salon Accounting Expert</button>
