    <section class="page-hero">
        <div class="container">
            <h1> Logistics & Transportation Accounting</h1>
            <p class="lead">Specialized accounting for trucking companies, freight brokers, and logistics providers</p>
        </div>
    </section>

    <section class="page-content">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="content-layout">
                <aside class="sidebar">
                    <div class="sidebar-widget">
                        <h3>Logistics Services</h3>
                        <ul class="sidebar-menu">
                            <li><a href="#fleet">Fleet Accounting</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#load">Load Profitability</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#driver">Driver Settlements</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#ifta">IFTA Reporting</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#fuel">Fuel Tax Compliance</a></li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="sidebar-widget cta-widget">
                        <h3>Transportation Expert</h3>
                        <p>Talk to our logistics specialist</p>
                        <button class="btn-primary" onclick="openModal()">Get Started</button>
                    </div>
                </aside>

                <main class="main-content">
                    <article>
                        <h2>Accounting Built for Transportation</h2>
                        <p>Transportation and logistics companies face unique accounting challenges: per-mile cost calculations, fuel tax reporting (IFTA), driver settlements, load profitability tracking, and fleet management. Phenom provides specialized accounting that understands the trucking and logistics industry.</p>

                        <h3 id="fleet"> Fleet Cost Management</h3>
                        <p>Track all vehicle-related costs:</p>
                        
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-truck"></i>
                                <h4>Vehicle Costs</h4>
                                <p>Track costs by individual truck or trailer</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-wrench"></i>
                                <h4>Maintenance Tracking</h4>
                                <p>Preventive maintenance and repair costs</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-gas-pump"></i>
                                <h4>Fuel Management</h4>
                                <p>Fuel costs, MPG tracking, fuel cards</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-line"></i>
                                <h4>Cost per Mile</h4>
                                <p>Calculate operating cost per mile by vehicle</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3>Fleet Operating Costs</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Fuel:</strong> Diesel, DEF, fuel surcharges</li>
                            <li><strong>Maintenance:</strong> PM services, repairs, tires</li>
                            <li><strong>Insurance:</strong> Liability, cargo, physical damage</li>
                            <li><strong>Licensing:</strong> Plates, permits, UCR, IRP</li>
                            <li><strong>Depreciation:</strong> Vehicle depreciation schedules</li>
                            <li><strong>Financing:</strong> Truck payments and interest</li>
                            <li><strong>Tolls & Parking:</strong> Toll costs, parking fees</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="load"> Load & Route Profitability</h3>
                        <p>Know which loads are profitable:</p>

                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-dollar-sign"></i>
                                <h4>Revenue per Load</h4>
                                <p>Track revenue by individual load or route</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-route"></i>
                                <h4>Direct Costs</h4>
                                <p>Fuel, tolls, driver pay per load</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-pie"></i>
                                <h4>Margin Analysis</h4>
                                <p>Gross profit margin by load and lane</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-map-marked-alt"></i>
                                <h4>Lane Profitability</h4>
                                <p>Best and worst performing routes</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3>Revenue Types</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Freight Revenue:</strong> Per load, per mile, or flat rate</li>
                            <li><strong>Fuel Surcharge:</strong> FSC passed through from customers</li>
                            <li><strong>Accessorial Charges:</strong> Detention, layover, lumper fees</li>
                            <li><strong>Backhaul Revenue:</strong> Return load income</li>
                            <li><strong>Brokerage Revenue:</strong> Margin on brokered loads</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="driver"> Driver Settlements & Pay</h3>
                        <p>Accurate driver compensation tracking:</p>

                        <h4>Driver Pay Models</h4>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-road"></i>
                                <h4>Per Mile</h4>
                                <p>Most common - pay per mile driven</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-percentage"></i>
                                <h4>Percentage of Load</h4>
                                <p>Driver gets % of gross revenue</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-dollar-sign"></i>
                                <h4>Per Load/Trip</h4>
                                <p>Flat rate per completed load</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-clock"></i>
                                <h4>Hourly</h4>
                                <p>Hourly wages for local drivers</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3>Driver Settlement Components</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Base Pay:</strong> Mileage, percentage, or per-load pay</li>
                            <li><strong>Accessorial Pay:</strong> Detention, layover, tarping</li>
                            <li><strong>Safety Bonuses:</strong> Performance and safety incentives</li>
                            <li><strong>Advances:</strong> Track advances given to drivers</li>
                            <li><strong>Deductions:</strong> Fuel advances, insurance, escrow</li>
                            <li><strong>Owner-Operator Deductions:</strong> Lease payments, maintenance</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="ifta"> IFTA Fuel Tax Reporting</h3>
                        <p>Complete International Fuel Tax Agreement compliance:</p>

                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-map-marked"></i>
                                <h4>Mileage by State</h4>
                                <p>Track miles driven in each jurisdiction</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-gas-pump"></i>
                                <h4>Fuel Purchases</h4>
                                <p>Record gallons purchased by state</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-calculator"></i>
                                <h4>MPG Calculation</h4>
                                <p>Calculate average miles per gallon</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-file-alt"></i>
                                <h4>Quarterly Filing</h4>
                                <p>IFTA tax return preparation and filing</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3>IFTA Process</h3>
                        <ol style="line-height: 2;">
                            <li>Collect trip sheets or ELD data showing miles by state</li>
                            <li>Gather fuel receipts showing gallons and tax paid</li>
                            <li>Calculate total miles and fuel consumed by jurisdiction</li>
                            <li>Determine MPG and fuel consumed per state</li>
                            <li>Calculate tax owed or credit due by state</li>
                            <li>File quarterly IFTA return and pay net tax</li>
                        </ol>

                        <h3 id="fuel"> Fuel Tax & Card Management</h3>
                        <p>Manage fuel purchases and taxes:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Fuel Cards:</strong> Track Comdata, EFS, WEX transactions</li>
                            <li><strong>Fuel Discounts:</strong> Monitor pump discounts and rebates</li>
                            <li><strong>Unauthorized Purchases:</strong> Flag non-fuel purchases</li>
                            <li><strong>Tax Tracking:</strong> Separate federal and state fuel taxes</li>
                            <li><strong>Reconciliation:</strong> Match fuel card statements to receipts</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Compliance & Licensing</h2>
                        <p>Track transportation-specific compliance costs:</p>

                        <h3>Federal Compliance</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>UCR:</strong> Unified Carrier Registration fees</li>
                            <li><strong>HVUT:</strong> Heavy Vehicle Use Tax (Form 2290)</li>
                            <li><strong>DOT Compliance:</strong> Drug testing, medical exams, audits</li>
                            <li><strong>ELD Compliance:</strong> Electronic logging device requirements</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3>State Compliance</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>IRP:</strong> International Registration Plan (apportioned plates)</li>
                            <li><strong>Permits:</strong> Oversize/overweight, trip permits</li>
                            <li><strong>State Highway Use:</strong> NY, NM, KY, OR state taxes</li>
                            <li><strong>Sales Tax:</strong> Use tax on out-of-state purchases</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Factoring & Cash Flow</h2>
                        <p>Manage freight factoring relationships:</p>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-hand-holding-usd"></i>
                                <h4>Factoring Fees</h4>
                                <p>Track factoring costs as % of receivables</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-file-invoice-dollar"></i>
                                <h4>Invoice Tracking</h4>
                                <p>Monitor invoices sent to factor</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-exclamation-triangle"></i>
                                <h4>Chargebacks</h4>
                                <p>Handle customer disputes and chargebacks</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-money-check-alt"></i>
                                <h4>Cash Flow</h4>
                                <p>Improved cash flow through factoring</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h2>Key Performance Metrics</h2>
                        <p>Essential KPIs for transportation companies:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Revenue per Mile:</strong> Total revenue divided by loaded miles</li>
                            <li><strong>Cost per Mile:</strong> All-in operating cost per mile</li>
                            <li><strong>Operating Ratio:</strong> Operating expenses as % of revenue (target: <95%)</li>
                            <li><strong>Deadhead %:</strong> Empty miles as % of total miles</li>
                            <li><strong>Utilization Rate:</strong> % of available truck-days utilized</li>
                            <li><strong>Fuel Economy:</strong> Miles per gallon by vehicle</li>
                            <li><strong>On-Time Delivery:</strong> % of loads delivered on time</li>
                            <li><strong>Driver Turnover:</strong> Annual driver turnover rate</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Software Integration</h2>
                        <p>We integrate with trucking management systems:</p>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                                <h4>McLeod</h4>
                                <p>LoadMaster TMS integration</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                                <h4>TMW</h4>
                                <p>TMW Systems TMS</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                                <h4>Axon</h4>
                                <p>Axon trucking software</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                                <h4>ProTransport</h4>
                                <p>ProTransport dispatch system</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h2>Financial Reports</h2>
                        <p>Transportation-specific financial reporting:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Profit & Loss by Truck:</strong> P&L for each vehicle</li>
                            <li><strong>Lane Analysis:</strong> Profitability by route/lane</li>
                            <li><strong>Driver Profitability:</strong> Revenue and costs by driver</li>
                            <li><strong>Fleet Summary:</strong> Performance metrics by vehicle</li>
                            <li><strong>IFTA Summary:</strong> Quarterly tax liability projection</li>
                            <li><strong>Fuel Analysis:</strong> Fuel costs and MPG trends</li>
                            <li><strong>Maintenance Schedule:</strong> Upcoming maintenance costs</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Business Models We Serve</h2>
                        <p>Specialized accounting for all transportation types:</p>

                        <h3> Asset-Based Carriers</h3>
                        <p>Own and operate fleet of trucks</p>

                        <h3> Owner-Operator Fleets</h3>
                        <p>Lease-on owner-operators under your authority</p>

                        <h3> Freight Brokers</h3>
                        <p>Broker loads without owning trucks</p>

                        <h3> 3PL/Logistics Providers</h3>
                        <p>Comprehensive logistics services</p>

                        <h2>Why Trucking Companies Choose Phenom</h2>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-truck-moving"></i>
                                <h4>Industry Expertise</h4>
                                <p>We understand trucking operations</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-line"></i>
                                <h4>Improve Margins</h4>
                                <p>Identify unprofitable lanes and loads</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-file-invoice"></i>
                                <h4>IFTA Compliance</h4>
                                <p>Accurate quarterly fuel tax reporting</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-hand-holding-usd"></i>
                                <h4>Better Cash Flow</h4>
                                <p>Manage factoring and collections</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h2>Get Started</h2>
                        <p>Ready to gain better visibility into your fleet's profitability and ensure compliance with all fuel tax requirements? Our transportation accounting specialists are here to help.</p>
                        
                        <div style="text-align: center; margin: 3rem 0;">
                            <button class="btn-large" onclick="openModal()">Talk to a Transportation Accounting Expert</button>

                        <h2>Accounting Built for Healthcare Providers</h2>
                        <p>Medical practices face unique accounting challenges: complex insurance reimbursements, patient copays and deductibles, denial management, credentialing costs, and strict HIPAA compliance. Phenom provides specialized healthcare accounting that understands the medical billing and practice management landscape.</p>

                        <h3 id="insurance"> Insurance Billing & Reimbursement</h3>
                        <p>Navigate complex insurance reimbursements:</p>
                        
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-file-medical"></i>
                                <h4>Claims Tracking</h4>
                                <p>Monitor submitted, pending, and paid claims</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-money-check-alt"></i>
                                <h4>EOB Reconciliation</h4>
                                <p>Match Explanation of Benefits to payments</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-ban"></i>
                                <h4>Denial Management</h4>
                                <p>Track denials and resubmission revenue</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-credit-card"></i>
                                <h4>Payer Mix Analysis</h4>
                                <p>Revenue by insurance type (Medicare, PPO, HMO)</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3>Insurance Revenue Tracking</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Medicare/Medicaid:</strong> Government reimbursement tracking</li>
                            <li><strong>Private Insurance:</strong> Commercial payer reconciliation</li>
                            <li><strong>Worker's Compensation:</strong> Work injury claims</li>
                            <li><strong>Auto Insurance:</strong> Accident-related treatment</li>
                            <li><strong>Patient Responsibility:</strong> Copays, coinsurance, deductibles</li>
                            <li><strong>Contractual Adjustments:</strong> Write-offs per payer contracts</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="patient-ar"> Patient Accounts Receivable</h3>
                        <p>Manage patient billing and collections:</p>

                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-user-injured"></i>
                                <h4>Patient Statements</h4>
                                <p>Generate and send patient billing statements</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-clock"></i>
                                <h4>Aging Reports</h4>
                                <p>30/60/90+ day aging by patient and payer</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-phone"></i>
                                <h4>Collections Tracking</h4>
                                <p>Monitor collection efforts and success rates</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-ban"></i>
                                <h4>Bad Debt Write-offs</h4>
                                <p>Track uncollectible accounts</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3>Patient AR Management</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Copay Collection:</strong> Track at-visit copays vs. billed later</li>
                            <li><strong>Deductible Tracking:</strong> Monitor patient deductible status</li>
                            <li><strong>Payment Plans:</strong> Set up and track installment agreements</li>
                            <li><strong>Refunds:</strong> Process overpayment refunds</li>
                            <li><strong>Credit Balances:</strong> Identify and resolve credit balances</li>
                            <li><strong>Collection Agency:</strong> Track accounts sent to collections</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="revenue"> Revenue Cycle Management</h3>
                        <p>Complete revenue cycle accounting support:</p>

                        <h4>Pre-Service</h4>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Insurance verification tracking</li>
                            <li>Prior authorization requirements</li>
                            <li>Patient eligibility checks</li>
                            <li>Estimated patient responsibility</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h4>Point of Service</h4>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Copay and deductible collection</li>
                            <li>Service documentation (CPT/ICD-10 codes)</li>
                            <li>Charge capture verification</li>
                            <li>Modifier usage tracking</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h4>Post-Service</h4>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Claims submission tracking</li>
                            <li>Payment posting (insurance and patient)</li>
                            <li>Denial and appeal management</li>
                            <li>Patient statement generation</li>
                            <li>Collection follow-up</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3>Key Performance Indicators</h3>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-line"></i>

                            </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3 id="compliance"> Healthcare Compliance & Reporting</h3>
                        <p>Stay compliant with healthcare regulations:</p>

                        <h4>HIPAA Compliance</h4>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Business Associate Agreement (BAA) in place</li>
                            <li>Encrypted data transmission and storage</li>
                            <li>Access controls and audit logs</li>
                            <li>Staff training on PHI protection</li>
                            <li>Breach notification procedures</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h4>Stark Law & Anti-Kickback</h4>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Physician self-referral monitoring</li>
                            <li>Fair market value compensation tracking</li>
                            <li>Vendor relationship documentation</li>
                            <li>Lease and service agreement review</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h4>Medicare/Medicaid Compliance</h4>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Cost report preparation (if applicable)</li>
                            <li>Medicare secondary payer tracking</li>
                            <li>Medicaid encounter reporting</li>
                            <li>MIPS/Quality payment program reporting</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Financial Reports for Healthcare</h2>

    <!-- Footer will be loaded here -->
    <div id="footer-placeholder"></div>

    <!-- Modal -->
    <div id="enquiryModal" class="modal">
        <!-- Your existing modal content -->
    </div>

    <!-- Load Header & Footer -->
    <script src="../../script.js"></script>
    <script>
        // Load Header
        fetch('../../includes/header.html')
            .then(response => response.text())
            .then(data => {
                document.getElementById('header-placeholder').innerHTML = data;
                
                // Initialize after header loads
                setTimeout(() => {
                    if (typeof initMobileMenu === 'function') initMobileMenu();
                    if (typeof initStickyHeader === 'function') initStickyHeader();
                }, 100);
            })
            .catch(error => console.error('Header error:', error));

        // Load Footer
        fetch('../../includes/footer.html')
            .then(response => response.text())
            .then(data => {
                document.getElementById('footer-placeholder').innerHTML = data;
            })
            .catch(error => console.error('Footer error:', error));
    </script>
</body>

                <main class="main-content">
                    <article>
                        <h2>Accounting Built for E-commerce</h2>
                        <p>Running an online store comes with unique accounting challenges: multiple sales channels, complex inventory tracking, marketplace fees, fulfillment costs, and multi-state sales tax compliance. Phenom provides specialized e-commerce accounting that handles all of this seamlessly.</p>

                        <h3 id="multi-channel"> Multi-Channel Sales Tracking</h3>
                        <p>We integrate and reconcile sales from all your channels:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Amazon:</strong> FBA and FBM sales, fees, refunds</li>
                            <li><strong>eBay:</strong> Transaction tracking and fee reconciliation</li>
                            <li><strong>Shopify:</strong> Direct integration with sales data</li>
                            <li><strong>WooCommerce:</strong> WordPress store accounting</li>
                            <li><strong>Etsy:</strong> Handmade and craft sales tracking</li>
                            <li><strong>Walmart Marketplace:</strong> Sales and fulfillment</li>
                            <li><strong>Your Website:</strong> Direct sales tracking</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="inventory"> Inventory Management</h3>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">

                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-warehouse"></i>
                                <h4>FBA Inventory</h4>
                                <p>Amazon FBA inventory reconciliation</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-line"></i>
                                <h4>Inventory Reports</h4>
                                <p>Turnover, aging, and valuation reports</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3 id="reconciliation"> Marketplace Reconciliation</h3>
                        <p>Complete reconciliation of all marketplace activity:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Daily settlement reconciliation</li>
                            <li>Fee tracking and categorization</li>
                            <li>Refund and return processing</li>
                            <li>Promotional discounts and coupons</li>
                            <li>Advertising costs (PPC, sponsored products)</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="sales-tax"> Sales Tax Compliance</h3>
                        <p>Navigate complex multi-state sales tax:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Nexus Analysis:</strong> Determine where you must collect tax</li>
                            <li><strong>Tax Registration:</strong> Register in all required states</li>
                            <li><strong>Automated Calculation:</strong> Proper tax on every transaction</li>
                            <li><strong>Return Filing:</strong> Timely filing in all states</li>
                            <li><strong>Economic Nexus:</strong> Track thresholds by state</li>
                        </ul>

construction

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Construction & Contractor Accounting - Phenom</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Specialized accounting for construction contractors. Job costing, progress billing, retainage, change orders, WIP schedules.">
    
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/style.css">
     <!-- FavIcon  -->
    <link rel="icon" href="Logo1.jpeg" type="image/x-icon">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/assets/css/pages.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:wght@300;400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body>

    <div class="scroll-progress" id="scrollProgress"></div>
    <div id="header-placeholder"></div>

    <section class="breadcrumb-section">
        <div class="container">
            <nav class="breadcrumb">
                <a href="/index.html"><i class="fa-solid fa-home"></i> Home</a>
                <span class="separator">/</span>
                <a href="#">Industries</a>
                <span class="separator">/</span>
                <span class="current">Construction</span>
            </nav>
        </div>
    </section>

    <section class="page-hero">
        <div class="container">
            <h1> Construction & Contractor Accounting</h1>
            <p class="lead">Specialized accounting for general contractors, subcontractors, and builders</p>
        </div>
    </section>

    <section class="page-content">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="content-layout">
                <aside class="sidebar">
                    <div class="sidebar-widget">
                        <h3>Construction Services</h3>
                        <ul class="sidebar-menu">
                            <li><a href="#job-costing">Job Costing</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#wip">WIP Schedules</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#progress">Progress Billing</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#retainage">Retainage Tracking</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#change-orders">Change Orders</a></li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="sidebar-widget cta-widget">
                        <h3>Construction Expert</h3>
                        <p>Talk to our construction specialist</p>
                        <button class="btn-primary" onclick="openModal()">Get Started</button>
                    </div>
                </aside>

                <main class="main-content">
                    <article>
                        <h2>Accounting Built for Construction</h2>
                        <p>Construction accounting is fundamentally different from other industries. With project-based revenue, complex job costing, retainage, progress billing, and work-in-progress schedules, contractors need specialized accounting expertise. Phenom provides comprehensive construction accounting services.</p>

                        <h3 id="job-costing"> Job Costing & Project Accounting</h3>
                        <p>Track profitability by job and phase:</p>
                        
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-hard-hat"></i>
                                <h4>Project-Level Tracking</h4>
                                <p>Costs and revenue by individual project</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-layer-group"></i>
                                <h4>Cost Code Structure</h4>
                                <p>Detailed cost codes by phase and category</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-line"></i>
                                <h4>Budget vs. Actual</h4>
                                <p>Compare estimated vs. actual costs in real-time</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-percentage"></i>
                                <h4>Job Margins</h4>
                                <p>Gross profit by project and overall</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3>Cost Categories We Track</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Direct Labor:</strong> Field labor hours and wages by trade</li>
                            <li><strong>Materials:</strong> Lumber, concrete, steel, fixtures, finishes</li>
                            <li><strong>Subcontractors:</strong> Electrical, plumbing, HVAC, specialty trades</li>
                            <li><strong>Equipment:</strong> Owned equipment costs and rentals</li>
                            <li><strong>Other Direct Costs:</strong> Permits, inspections, site costs</li>
                            <li><strong>Overhead Allocation:</strong> Project management, office, utilities</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="wip"> Work in Progress (WIP) Schedules</h3>
                        <p>Essential for construction companies:</p>

                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-clipboard-list"></i>
                                <h4>Monthly WIP Reports</h4>
                                <p>Complete WIP schedule for all active jobs</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-percentage"></i>
                                <h4>Percent Complete</h4>
                                <p>Cost-to-cost or physical completion methods</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-money-bill-wave"></i>
                                <h4>Revenue Recognition</h4>
                                <p>Percentage-of-completion accounting (ASC 606)</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-balance-scale"></i>
                                <h4>Over/Under Billing</h4>
                                <p>Track contract assets and liabilities</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3>WIP Schedule Components</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Contract Value:</strong> Original contract plus approved change orders</li>
                            <li><strong>Costs to Date:</strong> All costs incurred through period end</li>
                            <li><strong>Estimated Cost at Completion:</strong> Total projected job cost</li>
                            <li><strong>Earned Revenue:</strong> Revenue recognized based on % complete</li>
                            <li><strong>Billings to Date:</strong> Total invoiced to customer</li>
                            <li><strong>Over/Under Billing:</strong> Difference between earned and billed</li>
                            <li><strong>Estimated Profit:</strong> Contract value minus estimated total cost</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="progress"> Progress Billing & AIA Forms</h3>
                        <p>Professional billing for construction contracts:</p>

                        <h4>AIA Billing Documents</h4>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>G702:</strong> Application and Certificate for Payment</li>
                            <li><strong>G703:</strong> Continuation Sheet (schedule of values)</li>
                            <li><strong>Stored Materials:</strong> Materials on site not yet installed</li>
                            <li><strong>Previous Payments:</strong> Running total of prior applications</li>
                            <li><strong>Current Payment Due:</strong> This period's billing amount</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h4>Billing Types</h4>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-file-invoice-dollar"></i>
                                <h4>Lump Sum</h4>
                                <p>Fixed-price contracts billed by completion %</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-clock"></i>
                                <h4>Time & Materials</h4>
                                <p>Labor hours plus materials with markup</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-dollar-sign"></i>
                                <h4>Cost Plus</h4>
                                <p>Actual costs plus fixed fee or percentage</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-ruler"></i>
                                <h4>Unit Price</h4>
                                <p>Billing based on quantities installed</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3 id="retainage"> Retainage Management</h3>
                        <p>Track and collect retained amounts:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Retainage Held:</strong> Amounts withheld by owner (typically 5-10%)</li>
                            <li><strong>Retainage on Subs:</strong> Amounts you withhold from subcontractors</li>
                            <li><strong>Release Schedule:</strong> Track when retainage is due for release</li>
                            <li><strong>Final Payment:</strong> Ensure all retainage is collected</li>
                            <li><strong>Balance Sheet Impact:</strong> Properly classify retainage receivable</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h3 id="change-orders"> Change Order Tracking</h3>
                        <p>Manage contract modifications:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Pending Changes:</strong> Track unsigned change orders</li>
                            <li><strong>Approved Changes:</strong> Update contract value and budgets</li>
                            <li><strong>Cost Impact:</strong> Track cost changes vs. price changes</li>
                            <li><strong>Profitability:</strong> Monitor margin on change work</li>
                            <li><strong>Documentation:</strong> Maintain change order log and backup</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Subcontractor Management</h2>
                        <p>Complete subcontractor accounting:</p>

                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i>
                                <h4>Sub Contracts</h4>
                                <p>Track subcontractor agreements by job</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-file-invoice"></i>
                                <h4>Sub Invoices</h4>
                                <p>3-way match: PO, invoice, work complete</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-pause-circle"></i>
                                <h4>Retainage</h4>
                                <p>Calculate and hold subcontractor retainage</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-check-circle"></i>
                                <h4>Lien Releases</h4>
                                <p>Collect lien waivers before payment</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h3>Subcontractor Compliance</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Certificate of Insurance (COI) tracking</li>
                            <li>W-9 and 1099 management</li>
                            <li>Conditional and unconditional lien waivers</li>
                            <li>Prevailing wage compliance (if applicable)</li>
                            <li>Certified payroll reporting</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Union & Prevailing Wage</h2>
                        <p>For public works and union projects:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Certified Payroll:</strong> Weekly certified payroll reports</li>
                            <li><strong>Davis-Bacon:</strong> Federal prevailing wage compliance</li>
                            <li><strong>Fringe Benefits:</strong> Track and report benefit contributions</li>
                            <li><strong>Union Reports:</strong> Union dues and benefit fund reporting</li>
                            <li><strong>Apprenticeship:</strong> Apprentice ratio compliance</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Equipment Accounting</h2>
                        <p>Track owned and rented equipment:</p>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-truck-monster"></i>
                                <h4>Owned Equipment</h4>
                                <p>Depreciation, maintenance, allocation to jobs</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-handshake"></i>
                                <h4>Equipment Rental</h4>
                                <p>Rental costs by project</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-wrench"></i>
                                <h4>Maintenance</h4>
                                <p>Repair and maintenance schedules</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-gas-pump"></i>
                                <h4>Fuel Tracking</h4>
                                <p>Fuel costs by equipment and job</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h2>Financial Reports for Contractors</h2>
                        <p>Essential reports for construction businesses:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>Job Cost Reports:</strong> Detailed costs by project and cost code</li>
                            <li><strong>Job Profitability:</strong> Margin analysis by job</li>
                            <li><strong>WIP Schedule:</strong> Monthly work in progress</li>
                            <li><strong>Cash Flow Forecast:</strong> Project cash needs by job</li>
                            <li><strong>Committed Costs:</strong> POs and subcontracts not yet billed</li>
                            <li><strong>Over/Under Billing:</strong> Balance sheet impact</li>
                            <li><strong>Backlog Report:</strong> Unbilled work under contract</li>
                            <li><strong>Equipment Utilization:</strong> Equipment usage and costs</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Software Integration</h2>
                        <p>We work with all major construction software:</p>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                                <h4>Sage 300 CRE</h4>
                                <p>Formerly Sage Timberline</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                                <h4>Foundation</h4>
                                <p>Construction-specific accounting</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                                <h4>Procore</h4>
                                <p>Project management integration</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                                <h4>Buildertrend</h4>
                                <p>Residential construction software</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h2>Bonding & Financing Support</h2>
                        <p>Financial statements for bonding companies and lenders:</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li>Reviewed or audited financial statements</li>
                            <li>WIP schedules reviewed by CPA</li>
                            <li>Backlog and work on hand schedules</li>
                            <li>Equipment schedules and valuations</li>
                            <li>Bonding capacity analysis</li>
                            <li>Bank covenant compliance reporting</li>
                        </ul>

                        <h2>Why Contractors Choose Phenom</h2>
                        <div class="feature-grid">
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-hard-hat"></i>
                                <h4>Construction Expertise</h4>
                                <p>We understand construction accounting</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-chart-line"></i>
                                <h4>Better Job Margins</h4>
                                <p>Identify unprofitable jobs early</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-money-check-alt"></i>
                                <h4>Cash Flow Management</h4>
                                <p>Manage billing, retainage, and collections</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="feature-item">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-file-contract"></i>
                                <h4>Bonding Ready</h4>
                                <p>Financial statements for bonding companies</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <h2>Get Started</h2>
                        <p>Ready to gain better visibility into job profitability and improve your construction company's financial performance? Our construction accounting specialists are here to help.</p>

why-mindsapce

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>

                <h2 style="margin-top: 4rem;">What Sets Us Apart</h2>
                
                <div style="background: var(--bg-light); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; margin: 2rem 0; border-left: 4px solid #4a90e2;">
                    <h3><i class="fa-solid fa-graduation-cap"></i> Expertise & Qualifications</h3>
                    <p>Our team includes CPAs, CAs, ACCAs, and CMAs with extensive experience in US GAAP, IFRS, FRS 102, and ASPE. Every team member undergoes rigorous training and continuous professional development.</p>
                </div>

                <div style="background: var(--bg-light); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; margin: 2rem 0; border-left: 4px solid #4a90e2;">
                    <h3><i class="fa-solid fa-shield-halved"></i> Data Security & Confidentiality</h3>
                    <p>We employ bank-level 256-bit encryption, secure VPN connections, and ISO 27001 certified data centers. All staff sign strict NDAs and undergo background checks. Your data never leaves secure servers.</p>
                </div>

                <div style="background: var(--bg-light); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; margin: 2rem 0; border-left: 4px solid #4a90e2;">
                    <h3><i class="fa-solid fa-clock"></i> Time Zone Advantage</h3>
                    <p>Work continues while you sleep! Send files at end of your day, receive completed work next morning. This round-the-clock workflow dramatically reduces turnaround times.</p>
                </div>

                <div style="background: var(--bg-light); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; margin: 2rem 0; border-left: 4px solid #4a90e2;">
                    <h3><i class="fa-solid fa-chart-line"></i> Scalability & Flexibility</h3>
                    <p>Need more resources during tax season? No problem! We scale up or down based on your needs without the hassle of hiring or layoffs. Pay only for what you use.</p>
                </div>

                <div style="background: var(--bg-light); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; margin: 2rem 0; border-left: 4px solid #4a90e2;">

                </div>

                <h2 style="margin-top: 4rem;">Our Quality Assurance Process</h2>
                <ol style="font-size: 1.125rem; line-height: 2; padding-left: 2rem;">
                    <li><strong>Multi-Level Review:</strong> Every deliverable goes through 2-3 levels of review before submission</li>

                    <li><strong>Client Feedback:</strong> Regular feedback sessions to ensure satisfaction</li>

        // Load Header
        fetch('../../includes/header.html')
            .then(response => response.text())
            .then(data => {
                document.getElementById('header-placeholder').innerHTML = data;
                
                // Initialize after header loads
                setTimeout(() => {
                    if (typeof initMobileMenu === 'function') initMobileMenu();
                    if (typeof initStickyHeader === 'function') initStickyHeader();

            })
            .catch(error => console.error('Header error:', error));

        // Load Footer

            .then(response => response.text())

                <!-- Vision -->
                <div class="vision-card">
                    <div style="font-size: 4rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;"></div>
                    <h2 style="color: white; font-size: 2rem; margin-bottom: 1.5rem;">Our Vision</h2>
                    <p style="font-size: 1.5rem; line-height: 1.8; margin-bottom: 0; font-weight: 300;">
                        To be the world's most trusted accounting outsourcing partner, transforming how businesses manage their finances through innovation, expertise, and unwavering commitment to excellence.
                    </p>
                </div>

                <!-- Mission -->
                <div style="background: var(--bg-light); padding: 4rem; border-radius: 1rem; text-align: center; margin: 3rem 0;">
                    <div style="font-size: 4rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;"></div>
                    <h2 style="font-size: 2rem; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: var(--text-dark);">Our Mission</h2>
                    <p style="font-size: 1.25rem; line-height: 1.8; color: var(--text-light); max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto;">
                        To empower businesses worldwide by providing exceptional accounting and bookkeeping services that are accurate, affordable, and always delivered on time. We enable our clients to focus on growth while we handle the numbers.
                    </p>
                </div>

                <!-- Story -->
                <h2 style="text-align: center; margin: 4rem 0 2rem;">Our Story</h2>
                <p style="font-size: 1.125rem; line-height: 1.8; color: var(--text-light); margin-bottom: 1.5rem;">
                    Founded in 2010, Phenom Outsourcing began with a simple observation: small and medium-sized businesses were struggling with the high cost and complexity of maintaining quality accounting operations. Our founder, Rajesh Kumar, a CPA with over 20 years of experience, envisioned a better way.
                </p>
                <p style="font-size: 1.125rem; line-height: 1.8; color: var(--text-light); margin-bottom: 1.5rem;">
                    Starting with just 5 employees in a small office in Jaipur, India, we set out to prove that outsourced accounting could be more than just a cost-saving measureit could be a strategic advantage. By combining local expertise with global standards, leveraging technology, and maintaining an unwavering focus on quality, we grew rapidly.
                </p>
                <p style="font-size: 1.125rem; line-height: 1.8; color: var(--text-light); margin-bottom: 1.5rem;">
                    Today, we serve over 1200 clients across 6 countries, employ 200+ accounting professionals, and process millions of transactions annually. But our core mission remains unchanged: to provide exceptional accounting services that help businesses succeed.
                </p>

                <!-- Core Values -->
                <h2 style="text-align: center; margin: 4rem 0 3rem;">Our Core Values</h2>

                <!-- Commitments -->
                <h2 style="text-align: center; margin: 4rem 0 2rem;">Our Commitments</h2>
                
                <div style="background: var(--bg-light); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; margin: 2rem 0;">
                    <h3><i class="fa-solid fa-handshake"></i> To Our Clients</h3>
                    <ul style="line-height: 2; margin-top: 1rem;">
                        <li>Deliver accurate, timely, and reliable accounting services</li>
                        <li>Maintain complete confidentiality and data security</li>
                        <li>Provide transparent pricing with no hidden fees</li>
                        <li>Respond to queries within 24 hours</li>
                        <li>Continuously improve based on feedback</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

    <script src="../../script.js"></script>
    <script>
        // Load Header
        fetch('../../includes/header.html')
            .then(response => response.text())
            .then(data => {
                document.getElementById('header-placeholder').innerHTML = data;
                
                // Initialize after header loads
                setTimeout(() => {
                    if (typeof initMobileMenu === 'function') initMobileMenu();
                    if (typeof initStickyHeader === 'function') initStickyHeader();
                }, 100);
            })
            .catch(error => console.error('Header error:', error));

        // Load Footer
        fetch('../../includes/footer.html')
            .then(response => response.text())
            .then(data => {
                document.getElementById('footer-placeholder').innerHTML = data;
            })
            .catch(error => console.error('Footer error:', error));
    </script>

process

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Our Process & Workflow - Phenom Outsourcing</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Learn how we work. Our proven workflow ensures accuracy, transparency, and timely delivery of accounting services.">
    
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/style.css">
     <!-- FavIcon  -->
    <link rel="icon" href="Logo1.jpeg" type="image/x-icon">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/assets/css/pages.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:wght@300;400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    
    <style>
        .timeline {
            position: relative;
            padding: 2rem 0;
        }
        
        .timeline::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            width: 4px;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #4a90e2, #357abd);
        }
        
        .timeline-item {
            display: flex;
            gap: 2rem;
            margin-bottom: 3rem;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .timeline-item:nth-child(even) {
            flex-direction: row-reverse;
        }
        
        .timeline-content {
            flex: 1;
            background: var(--white);
            padding: 2rem;
            border-radius: 0.5rem;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
        }
        
        .timeline-number {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a90e2, #357abd);
            color: white;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: bold;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px white, 0 0 0 8px #4a90e2;
        }
        
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .timeline::before {
                left: 30px;
            }
            
            .timeline-item,
            .timeline-item:nth-child(even) {
                flex-direction: row;
            }
            
            .timeline-number {
                flex-shrink: 0;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

    <div class="scroll-progress" id="scrollProgress"></div>
    <div id="header-placeholder"></div>

    <section class="breadcrumb-section">
        <div class="container">
            <nav class="breadcrumb">
                <a href="/index.html"><i class="fa-solid fa-home"></i> Home</a>

    <section class="page-hero">
        <div class="container">
            <h1>Our Process & Workflow</h1>
            <p class="lead">Transparent, efficient, and proven methodology for exceptional results</p>
        </div>
    </section>

    <section class="page-content">
        <div class="container">
            <div style="max-width: 1000px; margin: 0 auto;">
                
                <h2 style="text-align: center; margin-bottom: 2rem;">How We Work</h2>
                <p style="text-align: center; font-size: 1.125rem; color: var(--text-light); margin-bottom: 4rem;">
                    Our systematic approach ensures consistent quality, on-time delivery, and complete transparency at every step.
                </p>

                <div class="timeline">
                    <div class="timeline-item">
                        <div class="timeline-content">
                            <h3><i class="fa-solid fa-handshake"></i> Initial Consultation</h3>
                            <p><strong>Duration: 30-60 minutes</strong></p>
                            <p>We start with a detailed discussion to understand your business, accounting needs, pain points, and goals. This helps us design a customized solution.</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Discuss current accounting setup and challenges</li>
                                <li>Review transaction volumes and complexity</li>
                                <li>Identify specific reporting requirements</li>
                                <li>Understand industry-specific needs</li>
                                <li>Provide preliminary cost estimate</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                        <div class="timeline-number">1</div>
                        <div style="flex: 1;"></div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="timeline-item">
                        <div style="flex: 1;"></div>
                        <div class="timeline-number">2</div>
                        <div class="timeline-content">
                            <h3><i class="fa-solid fa-file-contract"></i> Proposal & Agreement</h3>
                            <p><strong>Duration: 1-2 days</strong></p>
                            <p>We send a detailed proposal outlining services, deliverables, timelines, and pricing. Once approved, we execute a formal engagement letter.</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Customized service proposal</li>
                                <li>Clear scope of work</li>
                                <li>Transparent pricing structure</li>
                                <li>Service Level Agreement (SLA)</li>
                                <li>Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA)</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="timeline-item">
                        <div class="timeline-content">
                            <h3><i class="fa-solid fa-user-plus"></i> Team Assignment</h3>
                            <p><strong>Duration: 1 day</strong></p>
                            <p>We assemble a dedicated team based on your industry, software, and complexity. You'll be introduced to your Account Manager and team members.</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Dedicated Account Manager assigned</li>
                                <li>Specialized bookkeepers/accountants</li>
                                <li>Senior reviewer for quality control</li>
                                <li>Team introduction call</li>
                                <li>Communication preferences established</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                        <div class="timeline-number">3</div>
                        <div style="flex: 1;"></div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="timeline-item">
                        <div style="flex: 1;"></div>
                        <div class="timeline-number">4</div>
                        <div class="timeline-content">
                            <h3><i class="fa-solid fa-gear"></i> Setup & Access</h3>
                            <p><strong>Duration: 1-2 days</strong></p>
                            <p>We set up secure access to your systems, review your chart of accounts, and establish workflows. All access is logged and monitored.</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Accounting software access (view/edit permissions)</li>
                                <li>Bank feeds connection or statement access</li>
                                <li>Document portal setup</li>
                                <li>Secure VPN configuration</li>
                                <li>Communication tools setup (email, video, chat)</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="timeline-item">
                        <div class="timeline-content">
                            <h3><i class="fa-solid fa-books"></i> Historical Review</h3>
                            <p><strong>Duration: 2-3 days</strong></p>
                            <p>Our team reviews your prior period financials, reconciliations, and processes to understand your business and identify any issues.</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Review last 3-6 months of transactions</li>
                                <li>Verify chart of accounts structure</li>
                                <li>Check bank reconciliation status</li>
                                <li>Identify data quality issues</li>
                                <li>Document current accounting policies</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                        <div class="timeline-number">5</div>
                        <div style="flex: 1;"></div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="timeline-item">
                        <div style="flex: 1;"></div>
                        <div class="timeline-number">6</div>
                        <div class="timeline-content">
                            <h3><i class="fa-solid fa-rocket"></i> Go-Live</h3>
                            <p><strong>Start of ongoing services</strong></p>
                            <p>We begin processing your current period transactions. You'll receive regular updates and have full visibility into our progress.</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Daily transaction recording begins</li>
                                <li>Weekly progress updates</li>
                                <li>Questions addressed within 24 hours</li>
                                <li>First month closely monitored</li>
                                <li>Adjustments made based on feedback</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <h2 style="margin-top: 4rem;">Monthly Workflow</h2>
                <p style="margin-bottom: 2rem;">Our monthly accounting cycle ensures consistent, timely delivery:</p>

                <div style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(5, 1fr); gap: 1rem; margin: 2rem 0;">
                    <div style="background: var(--bg-light); padding: 1.5rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; text-align: center; border-top: 4px solid #4a90e2;">
                        <div style="font-size: 2rem; color: #4a90e2; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;"></div>
                        <h4 style="margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">Days 1-5</h4>
                        <p style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Document Collection & Data Entry</p>
                    </div>
                    <div style="background: var(--bg-light); padding: 1.5rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; text-align: center; border-top: 4px solid #4a90e2;">
                        <div style="font-size: 2rem; color: #4a90e2; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;"></div>
                        <h4 style="margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">Days 6-8</h4>
                        <p style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Bank Reconciliation & Review</p>
                    </div>
                    <div style="background: var(--bg-light); padding: 1.5rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; text-align: center; border-top: 4px solid #4a90e2;">
                        <div style="font-size: 2rem; color: #4a90e2; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;"></div>
                        <h4 style="margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">Days 9-10</h4>
                        <p style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Quality Control & Verification</p>
                    </div>
                    <div style="background: var(--bg-light); padding: 1.5rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; text-align: center; border-top: 4px solid #4a90e2;">
                        <div style="font-size: 2rem; color: #4a90e2; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;"></div>
                        <h4 style="margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">Day 10</h4>
                        <p style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Draft Financial Reports Sent</p>
                    </div>
                    <div style="background: var(--bg-light); padding: 1.5rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; text-align: center; border-top: 4px solid #4a90e2;">
                        <div style="font-size: 2rem; color: #4a90e2; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;"></div>
                        <h4 style="margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">Days 11-15</h4>
                        <p style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Review Call & Final Reports</p>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <h2 style="margin-top: 4rem;">Quality Assurance Process</h2>
                <p>Every deliverable goes through our rigorous quality control:</p>

                <div class="feature-grid">
                    <div class="feature-item">
                        <i class="fa-solid fa-user-check"></i>
                        <h4>Level 1: Preparer</h4>
                        <p>Experienced bookkeeper records transactions and performs initial reconciliation</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="feature-item">
                        <i class="fa-solid fa-magnifying-glass"></i>
                        <h4>Level 2: Peer Review</h4>
                        <p>Another bookkeeper reviews work using detailed checklist</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="feature-item">
                        <i class="fa-solid fa-user-tie"></i>
                        <h4>Level 3: Senior Review</h4>
                        <p>Senior accountant reviews financial statements and key metrics</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="feature-item">
                        <i class="fa-solid fa-thumbs-up"></i>
                        <h4>Level 4: Client Approval</h4>
                        <p>Client reviews and approves before finalization</p>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <h2 style="margin-top: 4rem;">Communication & Reporting</h2>
                <div style="background: var(--bg-light); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; margin: 2rem 0;">
                    <h3>Regular Touchpoints:</h3>
                    <ul style="line-height: 2;">
                        <li><strong>Daily:</strong> Team works on your books, email support available</li>
                        <li><strong>Weekly:</strong> Progress updates via email or project management tool</li>
                        <li><strong>Monthly:</strong> Financial reports delivery and review call (30-60 min)</li>
                        <li><strong>Quarterly:</strong> Strategic review meeting to discuss trends and planning</li>
                        <li><strong>Annually:</strong> Year-end close, tax prep planning, service review</li>
                        <li><strong>Ad-hoc:</strong> Available for urgent queries via phone/email/chat</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <h2>Tools & Technology We Use</h2>
                <div class="feature-grid">
                    <div class="feature-item">
                        <i class="fa-solid fa-laptop"></i>
                        <h4>Accounting Software</h4>
                        <p>QuickBooks, Xero, Sage, NetSuite, and 15+ others</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="feature-item">
                        <i class="fa-solid fa-cloud"></i>
                        <h4>Document Management</h4>
                        <p>Secure cloud portal for document exchange</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="feature-item">
                        <i class="fa-solid fa-comments"></i>
                        <h4>Communication</h4>
                        <p>Email, Zoom, Teams, Slack, WhatsApp</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="feature-item">
                        <i class="fa-solid fa-tasks"></i>
                        <h4>Project Management</h4>
                        <p>Asana, Trello for task tracking and transparency</p>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <h2 style="margin-top: 4rem;">Continuous Improvement</h2>
                <p>We're constantly refining our processes:</p>
                <ul style="line-height: 2; margin: 2rem 0;">
                    <li><strong>Client Feedback Surveys:</strong> Quarterly satisfaction surveys</li>
                    <li><strong>Monthly Team Reviews:</strong> Process improvement discussions</li>
                    <li><strong>Error Analysis:</strong> Track and eliminate recurring issues</li>
                    <li><strong>Training Programs:</strong> Ongoing staff education and certification</li>
                    <li><strong>Technology Updates:</strong> Adopt latest tools and automation</li>
                    <li><strong>Best Practices:</strong> Learn from every client engagement</li>
                </ul>

                <div style="background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a90e2, #357abd); padding: 3rem; border-radius: 1rem; margin: 4rem 0; text-align: center; color: white;">
                    <h2 style="color: white; margin-bottom: 1rem;">Experience Our Process</h2>
                    <p style="font-size: 1.125rem; margin-bottom: 2rem; opacity: 0.9;">See how our systematic approach delivers exceptional results</p>
                    <button class="btn-large" onclick="openModal()" style="background: white; color: #4a90e2;">
                        <i class="fa-solid fa-calendar"></i> Schedule a Demo
                    </button>
                </div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

        // Load Header
        fetch('../../includes/header.html')
            .then(response => response.text())
            .then(data => {
                document.getElementById('header-placeholder').innerHTML = data;
                
                // Initialize after header loads
                setTimeout(() => {
                    if (typeof initMobileMenu === 'function') initMobileMenu();
                    if (typeof initStickyHeader === 'function') initStickyHeader();
                }, 100);
            })
            .catch(error => console.error('Header error:', error));

        // Load Footer
        fetch('../../includes/footer.html')
            .then(response => response.text())
            .then(data => {
                document.getElementById('footer-placeholder').innerHTML = data;
            })
            .catch(error => console.error('Footer error:', error));
    </script>

infrastructure

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Infrastructure & Security - Phenom Outsourcing</title>
    <meta name="description"
        content="Learn about our world-class infrastructure, data security measures, and ISO certifications. Bank-level security for your data.">

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/style.css">
     <!-- FavIcon  -->
    <link rel="icon" href="Logo1.jpeg" type="image/x-icon">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/assets/css/pages.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:wght@300;400;500;600;700&display=swap"
        rel="stylesheet">
</head>

<body>

    <div class="scroll-progress" id="scrollProgress"></div>
    <div id="header-placeholder"></div>

    <section class="breadcrumb-section">
        <div class="container">
            <nav class="breadcrumb">
